abort.autonext: stay on this screen for a while
beidconnect.linux.step.1: Install the 'eID-archive' so the "eID" pakket repository becomes available
beidconnect.linux.step.2: Install the 'beidconnect' package in the usual way for your distribution. This may require you to first perform an update of the indexes (e.g. using "apt-get update").
beidconnect.linux.supported.title: Supported distributions and versions
certificate.choose.name: name : {commonName}
certificate.choose.text.1: Multiple valid certificates are found. Please select the certificate you want to use.
certificate.choose.title: Select a certificate
certificate.validate.title: Validating certificates
digestLoading.title: Signing document
eid.install.text.2: Please install eIDLink to use this application
eid.install.title: Install eIDLink
eid.link.error.card.not_found.title: No eId card found
eid.link.error.general.text: Something went wrong. Please reload the page and try again.
eid.link.error.general.title: Something went wrong
eid.link.error.reader.not_found.title: No eId reader found
eid.link.error.reader.not_supported.text: This application doesn't support this eID reader type
eid.link.error.reader.not_supported.titl: The eId reader is not supported
eid.update.text.1: The installed version of eIDLink is not up to date.
eid.update.text.2: Please install the latest version of eIDLink to use this aplication
eid.update.title: Update eIDLink
error.FAILED_TO_FETCH_DATA_TO_SIGN: Failed to fetch data to sign
error.METADATA_FETCH: Failed to fetch the metadata of the document
extension.install.text.2: Please install the eIDLink extension to use this application.
extension.install.text.3: After you installed the eIDLink extension you can come back to this page an push the "I have installed eIDLink Extension" button.
extension.install.title: Install eIDLink extension
file.download.text.1: The document to sign can't be previewed but you can download it by right-clicking on the link below and selecting the option 'save-link-as'.
metadataLoading.title: Retrieving Metadata
pin_length: PIN doesn't have the correct length
pin_timeout: entering the PIN took too long.
pinpad.error.title: Pin entry error
retrieve.certificates.title: Retrieving certificates
signing.loading.title: Sign document
signing.pininput.title: Enter pin code
signing.presign.text: Please enter the PIN {certificateName} when prompted
signing.presign.title: Sign document
succes.text: Your document will be automatically downloaded. If this is not the case, you can start the download manually
succes.title: Your document has been successfully signed!
token.intro.title: Digital signing of {fileName}
token.intro.txt: Welcome, {newLine} you are about to sign the document on the left.{newLine}{newLine}You can now insert your eID card into the card reader (make sure you know its PIN code) and then press the Start button to start signing the document.
